import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Desconto.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Desconto(){const[descontoData,setDescontoData]=useState({description:'',botao:''});// Requisição dos dados do desconto ao carregar o componente
useEffect(()=>{axios.get('http://localhost:3001/api/desconto').then(response=>{setDescontoData(response.data[0]);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Erro ao buscar dados do desconto:",error);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"simple-section",style:{backgroundImage:`url(${descontoData.image})`},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"texto-desconto",children:descontoData.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",children:descontoData.botao})]})});}export default Desconto;
